about_the_game:
Murder in Omar's Burger is an immersive 2-4 players game set in a burger restaurant gripped by a murder mystery.
Take on the role of a Detective or Killer in each game, and challenge your detective and stealth skills with your friends.

Detective

You are investigating a burger restaurant to find a murder suspect.

  • Find and shoot the killer among employees!
  • Search for evidence to gather clues about the killer.
  • If you shoot the wrong person, you lose.

Killer

Hide the evidence and kill the detective before he figures out who you are.

  • Hide all the evidence before the detective shows up.
  • Keep working jobs to avoid drawing attention.
  • You can use power cuts to sneak behind the detective.
  • Watch for an opportunity to attack or switch the evidence's place.

Sneak

  • The Killer can be anyone among the restaurant employees.
  • Work among other employees to avoid attention.
  • The Killer can freely move during a power cut, while the detective must be extra careful.

Play Mods

  • 1 VS 1
  • 2 VS 2

Features

  • The appearance of the killer is randomly generated in every game.

Murder in Omar's Burger is an immersive 2-4 players game set in a burger restaurant gripped by a murder mystery.
Take on the role of a Detective or Killer in each game, and challenge your detective and stealth skills with your friends.

name: Murder in Omar's Burger

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: AMD FX-6300 / 3rd or 4th gen i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 650 / HD 7870
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10
  • Processor: i5 5500 +
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 940
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Murder in Omar's Burger is a social deduction game for 2-4 players, set in a restaurant where a murder has occurred. The Detective is trying to find the killer among the employees. The killer hides evidence and keeps a low profile in order to sneak up on the detective and stab him.
supported_languages:
English*, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
